invsim
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

This is the repository for inventory simulation module for Safe Decor.
It includes simulation and order recommendation functionality

## Install

``` sh
pip install invsim
```
